c74object.name: sp.mfccrt~
c74object.digest: Analyzes audio for MFCCs based on audio input
c74object.description: Analyzes audio for MFCCs based on audio input.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.mfccrt~ object outputs a list of 13 MFCC coefficients (skipping the 0th coefficient) which can be used for classification and clustering. It also outputs 104d of MFCC coefficients/stats as a buffer. Although abstract they can also be used to control parameters.

attribute.name: fftsettings
attribute.description: FFT settings consist of three numbers representing the window size, hop size and FFT size in samples: The hop size and fft size can both be set to -1 (and are by default), with slightly different meanings: For the hop size, -1 = windowsize/2 For the FFT size, -1 = windowsize snapped to the nearest equal / greater power of 2 (e.g. windowsize 1024 => fftsize 1024, but windowssize 1000 also => fftsize 1024) Constraints FFTSize, if != -1, will snap to the next greatest power of two if FFT size != -1, then window size is clipped at FFT size

attribute.name: history
attribute.digest: The size of the history window for smoothing
attribute.description: The size of the history window for smoothing.

attribute.name: rate
attribute.digest: Rate at which the frame is output (also sets the delay to make sure the window is analyzed)
attribute.description: Rate at which the frame is output (also sets the delay to make sure the window is analyzed).

attribute.digest: WHere in the source to start analysis.
attribute.description: Where in source to start the analysis, in samples. The default is 0.
